body_html: EDIT I have serious doubts if we want to follow through. It is not super useful to only rename the :current scope in Team, I think. With every step down the to do list, the refactoring becomes reaaaally cumbersome. At the end of the to do list, I had over 150 broken tests. HAHAHA.

body: EDIT I have serious doubts if we want to follow through. It is not super useful to only rename the :current scope in Team, I think. With every step down the to do list, the refactoring becomes reaaaally cumbersome. At the end of the to do list, I had over 150 broken tests. HAHAHA.
